hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the souls of Twinrova#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Shadow Temple#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple MQ GS Raised Island Courtyard

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Serenade of Water#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Don't believe in yourself. Believe in the me that believes in you!

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the soul of the Dark Link# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #the souls of the Bubble#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the souls of the Skull Kid# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Deku Shield#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Dodongo's Cavern#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Bolero of Fire# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: Expired Spoiler Log? Don't worry! The OoTR Discord staff can help you out.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.
